title: Game crashes before loading screen
body:
I just updated to the new patch today at first everything was going smooth. I got into champ a normal game, champ select went fine then as champ select ends and it goes to load the game this message appears "The application was unable to start correctly (0xc000005). Click ok to close the application." I then press ok and it takes me to the reconnect screen but when i press reconnect it does the same thing. I tried closing the reconnect tap and restarting lol but still the same thing. then i went away and came back after my team restarted and tried again and still same story.
Is anyone else having this problem and does anyone know how to fix it.{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this problem?
No i somehow fixed it by re downloading it again i dont really know how it got fixed but it did. Thanks for trying to help though

Update: I tried to reinstall league after uninstalling it but now this message comes up "unspecified error occurred. Please check logs for more information" can someone please tell me how to fix this because it is getting really annoying.
